items.title: Our guide to every Week 14 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
items.description: Shedeur Sanders vs. Cam Ward? Joe Burrow vs. Josh Allen? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 14 game.

items.title: Barnwell's end of the year prove-it list: 17 coaches and players with something at stake
items.description: Kenneth Walker III is among those with a lot to gain -- or lose -- over the season's final five weeks.

items.title: Big day for Detroit offense powers Lions over Cowboys
items.description: The Lions improved their playoff chances and the Cowboys' postseason hopes took a big hit.

items.title: The old, struggling Clippers have options -- none of them good
items.description: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst surveyed the league on LA's next steps. Three difficult paths emerged.

items.title: This East lead hasn't come easy for the Pistons' young core
items.description: With every win, Detroit and its young core are moving further away from the dregs of a grueling rebuild.
